analysis.description:
LescovexERC20.holdedOf (/unique_chucks/21/0xdc33d6c4997ed9c6f07644eca9c0ba72a6882052.sol#112-139) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- iNotValid == 0 || holded[_owner].time[iValid] >= requiredTime (/unique_chucks/21/0xdc33d6c4997ed9c6f07644eca9c0ba72a6882052.sol#120-125)
	- holded[_owner].time[i] < requiredTime (/unique_chucks/21/0xdc33d6c4997ed9c6f07644eca9c0ba72a6882052.sol#130-137)
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/21/0xdc33d6c4997ed9c6f07644eca9c0ba72a6882052.sol#66-74) should be declared external
